pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools, Measures and Statistical Tests for Cultural Evolution // Provides tools for measuring the compositionality of signalling systems (in particular the information-theoretic measure due to Spike (2016) http://hdl.handle.net/1842/25930 and the Mantel test for distance matrix correlation (after Dietz 1983) doi:10.1093/sysbio/32.1.21), functions for computing string and meaning distance matrices as well as an implementation of the Page test for monotonicity of ranks (Page 1963) doi:10.1080/01621459.1963.10500843 with exact p-values up to k = 22.
